attributes.action: Make abandoning spouses on Visa in a foreign country, a crime
attributes.additional_details: There are several times couples, either or both living in the UK, having marital issues taking their partners and abandoning in a foreign country and informing border agency that marriage is broken, The border agency is just cancelling the spousal visa without any kind of legal checks they were supposed to do, making the spouse undergo severely suffer unjustified severe physical and psychological trauma
attributes.background: Some couples without approaching court of law, taking the spouse living on visa to foreign countries and abandoning so that the spouse cannot enter back to the UK

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
